title: Omnichain
desc:
Post 2257
- The moment this card is played, all existing cards have the ⛓️ color added if they don't already have it. Cards drawn afterwards won't have it.
- While this Chain is active, no ⛓️ cards can be drawn, except by any cards that specifically draw ⛓️ cards.
- Chain Break: The last existing ⛓️ card is played.
